if you add the viewport tag in the header section content settings it should overwrite...

<http://kb.wsol.com/testing-of-disable-zoom?hs_preview=gZRZNdPY-4708638493>

I've placed (in view source its lines 119-120):
```

<meta name="HandheldFriendly" content="true" />
```
